text:
For those who think COVID-19 is “just like the flu”, “flu kills more”, “the panic is more dangerous”, “herd immunity is best” take a stroll down this thread. 

You’ll also note both Prez Trump & Fox News have about-turned on those talking points. https://t.co/4MNzhXzYhs
